name: 'Coquetterie' cosmetic wallet PDF pattern
description:
This is a PDF pattern that will be EMAILED to you. 

==========================

'Coquetterie' cosmetic wallet

by Roslyn Mirrington of <a href="http://bloomandblossom.blogspot.com/">Bloom<a/>.

Price is in Australian dollars.

A PERFECT COMPANION FOR TRAVELLING, KEEP YOUR COSMETICS NEATLY AND AT HAND WITH THIS FUNCTIONAL WALLET

This elegant wallet combines yesteryear elements of monogrammed linen, with all the functionality required by the 21st century woman. It has specialised compartments for storing all your makeup needs. The wallet is able to be folded for travel, and unfolds to hang conveniently for easy access when you reach your destination.

Finished size (folded): 7¾” x 11” (20cm x 28cm)
Finished size (unfolded): 11” x 34¾” (28cm x 88cm)

The pattern includes: 
List of fabric requirements 
Detailed cutting, layout and assembly instructions and diagrams
Full monogram alphabet for personalising your wallet
Pattern sheets
Helpful tips throughout 

This pattern is a 10-page 2.2MB downloadable and printable PDF document. There are additional photos of this project in <a href="http://bloomandblossom.blogspot.com/p/gallery.html">the gallery<a/> on my blog, Bloom.

Please respect that this pattern has taken considerable time and effort to produce. Please do not reproduce or distribute this pattern without permission, or use for commercial purposes.

Upon receipt of payment, the PDF pattern will be emailed within minutes to your Paypal email address. Please ensure that your Paypal email address is correct. Please print your copy of the pattern immediately. There are no shipping charges.

name: Spin to Play PDF quilt pattern
description:
This is a PDF pattern that will be EMAILED to you. 

==========================

'Spin to Play'

by Roslyn Mirrington of <a href="http://bloomandblossom.blogspot.com/">Bloom<a/>.

Take your chances with this little quilt and spin up some fun! Complete with a moving spinner in the quilt's centre, it is an ideal quilt for play, for a picnic … or for a nap! 


Price is in Australian dollars.

The quilt is made using eight pre-printed picture panels. A ninth central panel features applique and a rotating spinner. 

Quilt size: approximately 53” x 57” (135cm x 145cm)
Panel size: approximately 10” x 11” (25cm x 28cm)
Please note that the exact dimensions of the quilt depend on the size of your chosen picture panels.


The pattern includes: 
List of fabric requirements 
Detailed cutting, layout and assembly instructions and diagrams 
Helpful tips throughout 
Binding instructions

This pattern is an 15-page 2.2MB downloadable and printable PDF document. There are additional photos of this project at <a href="http://bloomandblossom.blogspot.com.au/2013/02/spin-to-play-panel-quilt.html">this post<a/> and in <a href="http://bloomandblossom.blogspot.com/p/gallery.html">the gallery<a/> on my blog, Bloom.

Please respect that this pattern has taken considerable time and effort to produce. Please do not reproduce or distribute this pattern without permission, or use for commercial purposes.

Upon receipt of payment, the PDF pattern will be emailed within minutes to your Paypal email address. Please ensure that your Paypal email address is correct. Please print your copy of the pattern immediately. There are no shipping charges.

name: 'Beyond Measure' Part One - Sewing Machine Cover PDF pattern
description:
This is a PDF pattern that will be EMAILED to you. 

==========================

'Beyond Measure' Part One

by Roslyn Mirrington of <a href="http://bloomandblossom.blogspot.com/">Bloom<a/>.

Price is in Australian dollars.

JAZZ UP YOUR SEWING SPACE WITH THIS SEWING MACHINE COVER

The cover is a tailored design, closed at the ends to keep the dreaded dust at bay. It has piping trim, simple running stitch embroidery and pearl button embellishment. Twill tape, printed with 'measuring tape' markings, adds to the design. The cover is fully lined.

Finished size: 18” wide x 12¾” high x 8” deep (46cm x 32cm x 20cm)

The pattern includes: 
List of fabric requirements 
Detailed cutting, layout and assembly instructions and diagrams 
Helpful tips throughout 
Full template sheets

This pattern is a 10-page 1.9MB downloadable and printable PDF document. There are additional photos of this project in <a href="http://bloomandblossom.blogspot.com/p/gallery.html">the gallery<a/> on my blog, Bloom.

Please respect that this pattern has taken considerable time and effort to produce. Please do not reproduce or distribute this pattern without permission, or use for commercial purposes.

name: 'Beyond Measure' Part Two - Sewing Accessories PDF pattern
description:
This is a PDF pattern that will be EMAILED to you. 

==========================

'Beyond Measure' Part Two

by Roslyn Mirrington of <a href="http://bloomandblossom.blogspot.com/">Bloom<a/>.

Price is in Australian dollars.

JAZZ UP YOUR SEWING SPACE WITH THESE HANDY ACCESSORIES: A SEWING MACHINE MAT, THREAD CATCHER AND PINCUSHION.

The quilted machine mat is designed to sit beneath your sewing machine. It has a pocket panel, which overhangs your workspace, providing lots of storage nooks for your sewing tools of trade. It has piping trim, and is embellished with a twill tape, printed with 'measuring tape' markings. Finished size: 30” wide x 18” long (76cm x 45cm).

The thread catcher attaches to the mat using magnetic clips. It is removable for emptying. It has simple running stitch embroidery and pearl button embellishment.  Finished size: 4½” wide x 7½” high x 3” deep (11.5cm x 19cm x 7.5cm).

The pincushion is a simple, rectangular design and has a handy scissor keep at one end. It is embellished with running stitch detail on the side panels. Finished size: 9” wide x 1½” high x 3” deep (23cm x 4cm x 7.5cm).

The pattern includes: 
List of fabric requirements 
Detailed cutting, layout and assembly instructions and diagrams 
Helpful tips throughout 

This pattern is an 8-page 1.8MB downloadable and printable PDF document. There are additional photos of this project in <a href="http://bloomandblossom.blogspot.com/p/gallery.html">the gallery<a/> on my blog, Bloom.

Please respect that this pattern has taken considerable time and effort to produce. Please do not reproduce or distribute this pattern without permission, or use for commercial purposes.

name: 'Abracadabra' PDF quilt pattern
description:
This is a PDF pattern that will be EMAILED to you. 

==========================

'Abracadabra'

by Roslyn Mirrington of <a href="http://bloomandblossom.blogspot.com/">Bloom<a/>.

Price is in Australian dollars.

MAGICALLY TRANSFORM ONE LAYER CAKE INTO TWO QUILTS

Single bed size quilt: 66.5” x 81.5” (169cm x 207cm)
Small quilt: 44" x 57" (112cm x 145cm)

"The design for these quilts came about because I was keen to teach my daughters to quilt. The quilts have simple cutting, quick piecing and no seams to match. And with the addition of some low cost background fabric, they make optimum use of a single layer cake of fabric".

A layer cake is a coordinating collection of approximately forty 10" x 10" squares from a single fabric range. It is an economical way to purchase a small amount of each fabric in a range.

The pattern includes: 
List of fabric requirements 
Detailed cutting, layout and assembly instructions and diagrams 
Helpful tips throughout 
Binding instructions
A full alphabet for appliqued nameplate

This pattern is a 16-page 1.3MB downloadable and printable PDF document. There are additional photos of these quilts at <a href="http://bloomandblossom.blogspot.com/2010/11/announcing-abracadabra.html">this post<a/> and in <a href="http://bloomandblossom.blogspot.com/p/gallery.html">the gallery<a/> on my blog, Bloom.

Please respect that this pattern has taken considerable time and effort to produce. Please do not reproduce or distribute this pattern without permission, or use for commercial purposes.

name: 'Summer's Blush' PDF quilt pattern
description:
This is a PDF pattern that will be EMAILED to you. 

==========================

'Summer's Blush'

by Roslyn Mirrington of <a href="http://bloomandblossom.blogspot.com/">Bloom<a/>.

"For me, summer evokes thoughts of freshly picked, warm strawberries, and full blown roses, faded to a soft blush in a hot Australian sun. Enjoy stitching up your own little bit of summer with this quilt"! Bloom x

Price is in Australian dollars.

This quilt is constructed from a layer cake plus yardage for the sashings and borders. A layer cake is a coordinating collection of approximately forty 10" x 10" squares from a single fabric range. It is an economical way to purchase a small amount of each fabric in a range.

Quilt size: 93” x 93” (236cm x 236cm)
Block size: 16” finished

The pattern includes: 
List of fabric requirements 
Detailed cutting, layout and assembly instructions and diagrams
